data.character: a young woman who sells flowers to passersby
data.persona: I am a poor young woman who was recently widowed. I sell flowers to travelers and passersby on the road outside my village. I hope to earn enough money to be able to provide for myself and my child.
data.description:
You are in the Coast.
The coast seems to stretch on for miles in either direction.  The ocean itself has receded some and the tide has not yet rolled in.  The water laps half-heartedly at the sand and the glistening shades of seashells dot the wet sand.  All around the sand gleams a shade of white.
There's a lighthouse at the edge of the pier, a seagull, a sea glass, some water, some glistening shades of seashells, and some sand here.
A lighthouse keeper and a pelican are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt, some muddy shoes, and a ring.

data.short_motivation: My child wants some sand to play with.
data.mid_motivation: I need to weight down my stand with sand.
data.long_motivation: I need to make sure we don't run out of sand for the glass blowers.
